channel.title: Server Revision Selection
channel.description:
Not sure if I'm the first to post something about this, but does anyone else think it looks severely unprofessional and actually a bit homosexual :confused:
Here's an idea, only show an option for each revision that marks a serious/major update. Then show sub-options displaying all of the other odd revisions you decided to show; up until the next game-changing update.
I'll elaborate more if needed.. :palm:

item.title: Server Revision Selection
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

We just changed it because people said we needed more options. If you want to discuss the change, please use that topic.

https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,663120.50/topicseen.html

Read full topic

item.title: Server Revision Selection
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

Pretty sure revisions are client/cache revisions on jagex’s part. Besides it works now why change it. Just remember the major revisions, nobody uses anything other than major revisions anyway.

Read full topic
